domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @RonWyden It's disgusting to try to profit themselves and their rich friends/ donors on the back of this pandemic. But, holding our well being and lives hostage in exchange for this money... I'm tired of this kind of sick all encompassing greed. It's unjust. We have rise up and say no.
